extensionDescription.message: Een add-on voor onderhoud van de formulier historie (inzien, verwijderen, aanpassen, selectief opschonen, exporteren/importeren) en simpele formulier vuller, now Multiprocess (e10s) and WebExtensions compatible!

contextMenuItemManageHistory.description: Title of context menu item that starts the Manage history dialog.

contextMenuItemRestoreEditorField.description: Title of context menu item that displays the editor (wysiwyg) field values.

contextMenuItemFillMostRecent.message: Vul velden met meest recente waarden
contextMenuItemFillMostRecent.description: Title of context menu item that fills formfields with the most recent used value.

contextMenuItemFillMostUsed.message: Vul velden met meest gebruikte waarden
contextMenuItemFillMostUsed.description: Title of context menu item that fills formfields with the most used value.

contextMenuItemClearFields.description: Title of context menu item that clears all filled fields.

contextMenuItemShowformfields.description: Title of context menu item that shows info next to input textfields om the page.

contextMenuItemOptions.description: Title of context menu item that shows the preferences page.

menuItemFileImport.description: Label of Import menuitem in the File menu.

menuItemFileExport.description: Label of Export menuitem in the File menu.

menuItemFileClose.description: Label of Close menuitem in the File menu.

menuItemEditAdd.description: Label of Add menuitem in the Edit menu.

menuItemEditModify.description: Label of Modify menuitem in the Edit menu.

menuItemEditDelete.description: Label of Delete menuitem in the Edit menu.

menuItemEditClipboard.description: Label of Copy to clipboard menuitem in the Edit menu.

menuItemEditSelectAll.description: Label of Select all menuitem in the Edit menu.

menuItemEditSelectNone.description: Label of Select none menuitem in the Edit menu.

menuItemEditSelectInvert.description: Label of Invert selection menuitem in the Edit menu.

menuItemDisplayRefresh.description: Label of Refresh menuitem in the Display menu.

menuItemExtraPreferences.description: Label of Preferences menuitem in the Extra menu.

menuItemHelpOverview.description: Label of Invert menuitem in the Help menu.

menuItemHelpReleasenotes.description: Label of Invert menuitem in the Help menu.

menuItemHelpAbout.description: Label of Invert menuitem in the Help menu.
